price: A mos zotërojnë thesaret e Zotit tënd?! Apo mos janë ata sunduesit (e gjithçkaje)?!
arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُصَۜيۡطِرُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: am ʿindahum khazāinu rabbika am humu al-muṣayṭirūna
